content.en: Secure routing algorithms: Researchers have proposed various algorithms to address the challenge of achieving secure and efficient routing in wireless sensor networks. These algorithms utilize trust models, clustering algorithms, and energy efficiency considerations to ensure reliable data transmission and prevent malicious nodes from compromising the network. By integrating trust-based decision making and secure routing protocols, these algorithms aim to create a safe and energy-saving network environment for wireless sensor networks.
content.da: Sikre routing-algoritmer: Forskere har foreslået forskellige algoritmer for at tackle udfordringen med at opnå sikker og effektiv routing i trådløse sensornetværk. Disse algoritmer anvender tillidsmodeller, klyngealgoritmer og energibesparelseshensyn for at sikre pålidelig datatransmission og forhindre ondsindede noder i at kompromittere netværket. Ved at integrere tillidsbaseret beslutningstagning og sikre routing-protokoller, sigter disse algoritmer mod at skabe et sikkert og energibesparende netværksmiljø for trådløse sensornetværk.
